glsa.title: Bash: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in Bash, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Bash is the standard GNU Bourne Again SHell.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Bash. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Bash users should upgrade to the latest version:
